title: Herefordshire
summary: Herefordshire (/ˈhɛrɪfərdʃɪər/[3]) is a county in the West Midlands of England, governed by Herefordshire Council. It is bordered by Shropshire to the north, Worcestershire to the east, Gloucestershire to the south-east, and the Welsh counties of Monmouthshire and Powys to the west.
